Build your own data extraction and web monitoring tools with Botster!

This Chrome extension helps Botster users create custom automations for tailored scenarios. 

What can you do with it:

- Extract data from websites
- Monitor web content changes
- Receive alerts for crucial updates

How it works:

- Install the extension
- Navigate to Botster.io
- Start automating!

Have questions?
If you have any question about this extension, feel free to send us an email at info@botster.io or contact us via our help form.
